sentences.sContent: He left school without any qualifications.
sentences.sCn: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。

sentences.sContent: ...They can affect a person's ability to get a job and qualification for benefits...
...students may need to be recommended by their school or a teacher as part of the qualification process...

synos.tran: 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格

phrases.pCn: 资格考试；合格试验；质量鉴定试验
焊接工艺评定；焊接程序评定

remMethod.val: 来自qualify〔v. (使)具有资格， 限定〕

words.tran: 限定词，[语] 限定语；取得资格的人；修饰语
限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予
限制；使具有资格；证明…合格

trans.tranCn: 资格， 资格证明， 合格证书； 限制， 限定
trans.tranOther: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject
